scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix apps/web run dev" "npm --prefix apps/api run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix apps/api run build && npm --prefix apps/web run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n web,api -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix apps/web run start" "npm --prefix apps/api run start"
